replies.author: a13724082134
replies.txt_content:
区块错误
方法一：
区块修复插件
x=349159.01, y=34.00, z=-65636.34](3wroyosl at 349159.01020849997,34.0,-65636.34354072467), EntityPlayerMP['Bai_Gao'/524, l='world', x=348090.37, y=36.36, z=-68243.31](Bai_Gao at 348090.3681262434,36.36187138465262,-68243.31132125462)]复制代码
方法二：
你在服务端根目录找到Config文件夹打开forge.cfg文件康康
找到removeErroringEntities和removeErroringTileEntities 两个都改true
